column4: Is it possible to remove Evolution without everything else getting screwed?
Does anyone know if ubuntu will ever come as a barebones system?
as i understand it, it will install the dependencies of the ubuntu-base package
does that include GNOME and X ?
yes you can install them via apt-get
so it should be fairly painless?
well yes, but what is your situation?
then doing a server install and installing what you want with apt-get is the way to go :)
last question, what is the package name for X
DBDesigner4 might be worth a look - http://www.fabforce.net/dbdesigner4/
